description: This file defines a React context and hooks for managing application themes, including loading and saving theme preferences. It offers a ThemeProvider component to supply theme data and functions to switch themes dynamically with persistence.

methods.name: useTheme
methods.description: Hook to access the current theme within React components.

methods.name: useThemeController
methods.description: Hook to access theme control functions, allowing theme switching.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: React component that provides theme state and switching logic to its children.
